title: Ignota's SCP-6326 Pixel Fanart
content:

+ [[span class="linkOne"]][http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy-6581-pix/offset/1 Click here if the theme hurts your eyes][[/span]]
[[/=]]
[[div style="border-radius: 10px;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: center;
border:solid 2px var(--accentColor);
padding:15px;
margin-bottom: 15px;"]]
[[=]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/gvFYNip.png]]
++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7098720700592065834?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en Process Video] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6326 SCP-6326]

[[<]]
> **Filename:** 6326.mp4, 6326.png
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7098720700592065834?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en
> **Derivative of:** SCP-6326 by Raddagher
[[/<]]
-----

This article is good? Really good? Oh my god. I got a little carried away with the animation but I wanted to make the personality shine through as much as I could in this low res of pixel art lol. 

Honestly, I read fucking everything about Watts after this. The whole thing is incredible and I loved every little piece of it. It's funny, engaging, and frankly //relatable and genuine// as someone who's had my entire life path altered by surprise disability more than once. 

It's just really nice to read something funny and well handled at the same time.

[[div class="fadeout"]]
Also I'd like to put my opinion in on the "size" in the ring. So hear
[[/div]]

([https://i.imgur.com/XlkBvwL.gif If the apng doesn't animate click here for a gif version or just watch the video.])

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
